name: cfde_portal_prep_specs
title: Transformation of C2M2 model as intermediate ETL, converting to "nid" surrogate keys.

resources.name: file
resources.title: File
resources.description: A digital asset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this file is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the primary project within which this file was created

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: Numeric ID for the file_format term describing the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ)

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the data_type term describing information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads)

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the assay_type term describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: Numeric ID for the MIME type describing this file

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this file, unique in combination with this file's id_namespace.

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC (using, e.g., our minid server) and attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: The output of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function after being run on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: md5
fields.description: The output of the MD5 message-digest algorithm after being run as a cryptographic hash function on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information.

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

resources.name: biosample
resources.title: Biosample
resources.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this biosample in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this biosample is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the primary project within which this biosample was created

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: Numeric ID for the anatomy term describing the origin of this biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this biosample's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this biosample, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this biosample

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

resources.name: subject
resources.title: Subject
resources.description: A biological entity from which a biosample can be generated

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this subject is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the primary project within which this subject was created

fields.name: granularity
fields.description: A CFDE CV term categorizing this subject by multiplicity

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this subject record's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this subject, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this subject

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

resources.name: dcc
resources.title: DCC
resources.description: The Common Fund program or data coordinating center (DCC) that produced the top-level C2M2 metadataset identified by the given project foreign key

fields.name: project
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the top-level C2M2 project record representing byproducts of this DCC.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this DCC, issued by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: dcc_name
fields.title: DCC Name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this DCC.

fields.name: dcc_abbreviation
fields.title: Abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this DCC.

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Email address of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Name of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: dcc_url
fields.description: URL of the front page of the website for this contact's DCC

resources.name: project
resources.title: Project
resources.description: A node in the project hierarchy subdividing this id_namespace

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this project in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this project is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this project's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this project, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this project

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this project

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this project

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this project

resources.name: project_in_project
resources.title: project_in_project
resources.description: Association between a child project and its parent

fields.name: parent_project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the parent in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: child_project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the child in this parent-child project pair

resources.name: collection
resources.title: Collection
resources.description: A grouping of files, biosamples and/or subjects

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this collection in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: Numeric ID of the identifier namespace in which this collection is assigned a local_id.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this collection

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this collection

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this collection

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this collection

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

resources.name: collection_in_collection
resources.title: collection_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a containing collection (superset) and a contained collection (subset)

fields.name: superset_collection
fields.description: Numeric ID of the superset collection

fields.name: subset_collection
fields.description: Numeric ID of the subset collection

resources.name: collection_defined_by_project
resources.title: collection_defined_by_project
resources.description: (Shallow) association between a collection and a project that defined it

fields.name: collection
fields.description: Numeric ID of the defined collection

fields.name: project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the defining project

resources.name: file_in_collection
resources.title: file_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a file and a (containing) collection

fields.name: file
fields.description: The numeric ID of this file

fields.name: collection
fields.description: The numeric ID of this collection

resources.name: biosample_in_collection
resources.title: biosample_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a biosample and a (containing) collection

fields.name: biosample
fields.description: The numeric ID of this biosample

fields.name: collection
fields.description: The numeric ID of this collection

resources.name: subject_in_collection
resources.title: subject_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a subject and a (containing) collection

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The nueric ID of this subject

fields.name: collection
fields.description: The numeric ID of this collection

resources.name: file_describes_biosample
resources.title: file_describes_biosample
resources.description: Association between a biosample and a file containing information about that biosample

fields.name: file
fields.description: The ID of this file

fields.name: biosample
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

resources.name: file_describes_subject
resources.title: file_describes_subject
resources.description: Association between a subject and a file containing information about that subject

fields.name: file
fields.description: The numeric ID of this file

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

resources.name: biosample_from_subject
resources.title: biosample_from_subject
resources.description: Association between a biosample and its source subject

fields.name: biosample
fields.description: The numeric ID of this biosample

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

resources.name: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.title: Subject Role Taxonomy
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

fields.name: role
fields.description: The numeric ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

fields.name: taxon
fields.description: The numeric ID of an ncbi_taxonomy taxon

resources.name: assay_type
resources.title: Assay Type
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used in this dataset to describe types of experiment that generate results stored in files

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this assay_type in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.title: NCBI Taxonomy
resources.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe subjects in this dataset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this taxon in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

fields.name: clade
fields.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon (use 'no rank' if not defined)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: Anatomy
resources.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (Uberon) CV terms used in this dataset to locate the origin of a biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this anatomy in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An Uberon CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Uberon term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this Uberon term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: file_format
resources.title: File Format
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'format:' terms used to describe formats of files in this dataset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file_format in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV format term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM format term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM format term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: data_type
resources.title: Data Type
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'data:' terms used to describe data in files in this dataset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this data_type in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV data term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM data term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM data term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

resources.name: subject_role
resources.title: Subject Role
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The ontological role of an organism-level constituent component of a subject, e.g.: unitary organism (e.g. 'this subject represents a single orchid and that's it'), host, pathogen, symbiont, taxon detected in microbiome, host associated with microbiome, taxon in lineage of cell line, etc.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_role in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_role

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_role

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_role

resources.name: subject_granularity
resources.title: Subject Granularity
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The category of a subject in terms of multiplicity, e.g.: single organism; enumerated group of organisms and their relationships to one another (e.g. host X plus endosymbiont Y); host-associated microbiome; environmental microbiome; cell line

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_granularity in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_granularity

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_granularity

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_granularity

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: ID Namespace
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: Dictionary of CFDE-generated identifier namespaces corresponding to top-level C2M2 metadatasets

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this identifier namespace in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace

resources.name: mime_type
resources.title: MIME Type
resources.description: Dimension table of each distinct MIME type referenced by C2M2 files.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this MIME type in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique MIME type string

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace

resources.name: subject_species
resources.title: subject_species
resources.description: Collapsed association of subject-species, simplifying subject-role-taxonomy association

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

fields.name: species
fields.description: The numeric ID of a taxon categorizing described subject species

resources.name: project_in_project_transitive
resources.title: project_in_project_transitive
resources.description: Reflexive transitive-closure of project_in_project relationship

fields.name: leader_project
fields.description: The numeric ID of the leader (containing) project

fields.name: member_project
fields.description: The numeric ID of the member (contained or reflexive) project

resources.name: project_root
resources.title: Project Root
resources.description: The subject of project records which do not have a superset project by the project_in_project relationship.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the C2M2 project record which is a project root.

resources.name: collection_in_collection_transitive
resources.title: collection_in_collection_transitive
resources.description: Reflexive transitive-closure of collection_in_collection relationship

fields.name: leader_collection
fields.description: The numeric ID of the leader (containing) collection

fields.name: member_collection
fields.description: The numeric ID of the member (contained or reflexive) collection

resources.name: core_fact
resources.title: Core Fact
resources.description: Core C2M2 entity facts, representing classes of C2M2 entities characterized by the same combination of metadata concepts.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this fact record in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: The numeric ID of the id_namespace in which described entities were issued a local_id.

fields.name: projects
fields.description: The numeric IDs of source or defining project(s) attributed for the described entities.

fields.name: dccs
fields.description: The numeric IDs of source or defining DCC(s) attributed for the described entities.

fields.name: subject_roles
fields.description: The numeric ID of subject_role terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: subject_granularities
fields.description: The numeric ID of subject_granularity terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: subject_species
fields.description: The numeric ID of subject-species terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: ncbi_taxons
fields.description: The numeric ID of ncbi_taxonomy terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: anatomies
fields.description: The numeric ID of terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: assay_types
fields.description: The numeric ID of assay_type terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: file_formats
fields.description: The numeric ID of file_format terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: data_types
fields.description: The numeric ID of data_type terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: mime_types
fields.description: The numeric ID of mime_type terms qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: project
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular source or defining project attributed for the described entities.

fields.name: dcc
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular source or defining DCC attributed for the described entities.

fields.name: subject_granularity
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular subject_granularity term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: ncbi_taxon
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular ncbi_taxonomy term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular anatomy term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular assay_type term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular file_format term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singuar data_type term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: The numeric ID of a singular mime_type term qualifying the described entities.

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

fields.name: num_subjects
fields.description: The number of subjects with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_biosamples
fields.description: The number of biosamples with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_files
fields.description: The number of files with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_collections
fields.description: The number of collections with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: total_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The sum of size_in_bytes for files with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.
